text: Ani usita bhaniyoh ki mahalama pravesa gara. Jaba usale tyasako (pharsa) la'i dekhyo, taba usale tyasala'i paniko hauja than'yom ra aphno pidaula dekha'ihalyo. Sulaimanale bhane yo ta sisabata nirmita mahala ho. Tyasale bhani ki he mero palanakarta! Niscaya nai maile aphumathi atyacara garem. Aba maile sulaimanako sathama aphula'i allahama samarpita garidi'em, jo sampurna jagatako palanakarta ho
